title: Academy splash art secrets/speculation/theorys
body:
A new splash has come out and by tradition I found hidden Easter eggs. In the first picture normal splash art. Second picture zoomed in and  circle an almost invisible female behind Vlad. My guess probably eve.It looks a bit green to be eve but it could just be ekko time clone things trail they have. The last one is 2 mysterious figures talking and the picture was zoomed in and circled, The female to left has a chef hat and the man to right  seems to have a hammer. My guess the female is oriannia and the male is jayce. Tell me below what you think and always have a nice day!{{champion:222}}

New imagine New secrets a kind rioter Kindlegem gave a hint to look at the blackboard. I'm having trouble seeing anything but with the league of legends board community we can probably figure out the mystery of the blackboard

replies.body: That face even says it...
Yeah but what about the blackboard? >:P

Its the Pentagram for the colors of Magic the Gathering
If you follow it clockwise from the top you get:
W for White
B for Blue
An obscured spot for Black(probably obscured so that you don't have 2 "B")
A slightly obscured R for Red
And a G for green.

It represents the relations between the colors
Weirdly there is no connection from Blue to green,despite the fact that other opposing colors are connected through a line.

Nice eye! I imagine Ekko would be really into MtG at high school, I certainly was. There is no connection between Green and Blue for an interesting little reason:

Before I moved to the USA for this job I lived in Melbourne Australia where I had just one friend who played LoL with me. We love playing games together and his favourite colour of MtG is Green while mine is Blue. Since moving here I really miss him a lot and now we play LoL on different servers (although I try to get an ARAM in on OCE when I can) so the missing line is me missing my friend.

Or Ekko just isn't a fan of Simic decks >;)

Ravnica is love, Ravnica is life.

... until Boros comes and smashes everything up.
Awww how sweet <3

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8gVmlWux,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-12T21:12:02.786+0000)
>
> Yeah but what about the blackboard? >:P

....

It looks like the equation that Vel Koz writes....

O_O

{{champion:161}}
Pentagram = Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher Veigar/Thresh :3
If there's another circle besides the one in the bottom... he's drawing a very calculated penis ._.
What has been seen, cannot be unseen.

There's a small 42 in the corner next to derp Ekko, maybe suggesting a {{champion:42}} skin? it'd be pretty ace to see Corki flying around in a paper aeroplane

(Corki comes up as champion 42, I haven't just picked any random champ :-) )
Nah 42 is just the answer to everything, it's likely to come up on a blackboard
"42; there is just something about that number." - {{champion:74}}

I see Ekko demonstrating a way to calculate derivatives, the MTG color wheel, the number 42 (Hitchhiker's Guide!), that weird S-shaped symbol I can't remember the name of (the thing at the top right), a math problem with the solution 1414 (I can't find any significance to the number, though), and a diagram that I also don't understand.
Nice work! That last one may be some kind of capacitor... of flux.

> [{quoted}](name=Icestar1186,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8gVmlWux,comment-id=00030003,timestamp=2015-08-13T00:31:20.280+0000)
>
> I see Ekko demonstrating a way to calculate derivatives, the MTG color wheel, the number 42 (Hitchhiker's Guide!), that weird S-shaped symbol I can't remember the name of (the thing at the top right), a math problem with the solution 1414 (I can't find any significance to the number, though), and a diagram that I also don't understand.

1.414 is the square root of 2.  This most commonly comes up in right triangles; a right triangle with two sides of lengths 1 and 1 will have a hypotenuse with length sqrt 2.  (A^2 + B^2 = C^2; 2 = C^2; C = sqrt(2).  More generally, a right triangle whose lengths are the same number (let's call it A) will have a hypotenuse of length sqrt(2)*A = C.

(The number 1414 would arrive from a triangle whose A and B lengths are each 1,000.)
Thanks!
Surprised no one's mentioned the Vault symbol over Ekko's left shoulder yet(the one on the right). Next champion is a Siren confirmed?

I don't think it's a chef's hat, but part of a band uniform (or not a hat at all, but part of the background);

http://pre11.deviantart.net/8978/th/pre/i/2014/066/c/7/nonon_jakuzure_by_thetokieffect-d79ba2f.png
And the guy standing next to her also looks a lot like Gamagori.
Those two figures do resemble part of the Elite Four in Kill a Kill, Grimagori and Jakuzure.
That clone ekko face tho.... Needs to become a meme or something... He looks so troll

Did anyone notice that the guy behind the door is bald? He has tons of muscle and he's bald...

Leaves two candidates:
 
{{champion:201}}  {{champion:14}} 

And I don't see a moustache, so I think it's Sion...

Wow just going to forget about Singe are we?
{{item:3070}} {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}}
Singed is not this muscular I think...
Dare you to tell that to [Augmented Singe's face](http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120703145639/leagueoflegends/images/thumb/1/1a/Singed_AugmentedSkin.jpg/613x460x2-Singed_AugmentedSkin.png).

Hey guys, the woman in the mirror is morgana (aka her skin) she is holding a pan to bake cookies!
While in the hall/behind the door, I believe headmistress fiora would fit the role! But not confirmed.

The hammer looks more like it would be Tarics hammer than jayces.
But the rest of him looks more like jayce.
So I dunno about that guy,he might be even a new champ...

The woman is kinda interesting.The top hat and the hair looks a lot like caitlyn,but the missing neck is really weird(might be an oversight of the art team though).
Said tophat might actually be not a top hat at all,it could be actually a curtain.

The person behind vlad might be really evelynn,but it is extremely vague,so it could be almost anyone.
Also they wont probably release any Taric skins till his Sion level rework.
On the board on of the clearer numbers was 42 and I checked based on release date and Taric was number 42.
Well they already confirmed Tarics rework is end of this year early 2016.
I want the female to be something like Hall Monitor Cait
Wouldn't it be logical to assume the female is {{champion:51}}?
Well my main problem with it being caitlyn the woman figure doesn't have a neck of course this could be a mistake but I think its not and its just Orianna being a robot or something.

i think that the ahri splash art 7 is a reference 2 the anime kill la kill the left figure may be Nonon Jakuzure due to here large hat and the right figure may be Ira Gamagoori due to his large body shape, tell me what you think, :D

Hey, if it's Orianna: http://upload.inven.co.kr/upload/2014/04/24/bbs/i3402641877.png
idk, it's just something I found online.

I think that the hammer doesn't belong to the man... the man seems to be lucian since he's pulling out what seems like a gun from his pocket, plus he's got the low hair thing going on...

That leaves us with a girl and a hammer... could it be... poppy????? she looks too tall for that but still...
Not to be rude but the woman doesn't have a neck so how can it be poppy or anyother champ. Other than our only robot female champ oriannia.

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1439412395/Ahri_Splash_6.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/wUOuf37.jpg?1
Unpopular Annie

I like the idea of it being {{champion:61}} , I personally at first thought it was {{champion:99}} . 

Male imo is Jayce, pretty obvious one, or it just looks that way to throw us off maybe. lol
I thought Oriannia since the woman doesn't have a neck.
Is no one gonna bring up the fact that they are in classroom 1337 ?
Karma and either new taric or new champ. Shadow is swain or viktor. Black board is the 95th champion who ever that is.
Thats easy, its Nonon Jakuzure Lux (aka School Band Lux) and Professor Ryze after VU (the Hotter edition)
Really? Not Grimagori Taric?
It's Morgana with her sinful succulence skin and the other guy is Jayce

Well seeing has the woman has no/awkward neck i would assume that it might be Cassiopeia {{champion:69}} and the guy looks like Jayce {{champion:126}} IMO.
Also the 42 champ is Corki {{champion:42}} as it comes up as such when you click on the icon link, so that might be who's behind the door around the middle back.

the man looks like jayce since he's holding something like an hammer. but his face seems older and i'm almost sure he has a white beard.
The woman looks Caitlyn for her hat, but it has a ''wing'' like accessory on it.
Her cape, instead, looks lux's or fiora's.
